name: Alphabet Number Wooden Building Blocks Set -100 Blocks in 5 Water Paint Colors and 7 Shapes. Preschool Montessori Kids Baby Toys. Stacking Learning Toys for Toddlers. Age 18 Months +
short_description: Building blocks might seem like a simple toy for children, but they offer immense benefits for learning and development. When toddlers play with wooden building blocks, like trying to make a tower, they develop problem-solving and concentration skills. Our blocks for toddlers aged 1-3 are designed to encourage these key abilities.

Blocks also aid in boosting fine and gross motor skills, as well as hand-eye coordination. The more they practice stacking the blocks, the better they get at precise movements. Whether you're using stacking toys for toddlers 1-3 or more advanced building blocks for toddlers 2-4, each stage builds on important developmental milestones.

From an early age, playing with baby letter blocks helps children learn about cause and effect—understanding that their actions have consequences. Each time a child builds and knocks down a tower, they grasp the concept of what happens and why. This is why blocks for children 4-8 years are so effective in teaching problem-solving and logic. Additionally, building with stacking blocks fosters creative thinking, spatial awareness, and early numeracy skills.

Our colorful alphabet letter wooden blocks provide a great opportunity for children 4-8 to learn colors and shapes making them ideal for preschool learning toys. Through their play and creations, children express themselves—this is particularly valuable for bilingual or non-verbal children 3-5. Using manipulatives for preschoolers, children can communicate ideas and emotions without words. For example, a shy child may build an elaborate structure to show what they’re thinking.

Personal, social, and emotional development (PSED) is also enhanced through block play. Children learn to take turns, share materials, and cooperate with others, forging friendships. Our toddler building blocks encourage self-reliance and increase attention while building confidence. These benefits are crucial for all ages, from younger toddlers to blocks for kids aged 3-5.

Our abc montessori wooden building blocks are crafted with non- toxic water paint colors, ensuring they are safe for toddlers 1-3. These multi- colored blocks feature numbers, making them perfect for teaching children 2-4 and preschoolers about colors and numbers. Ideal for littles ones who love to explore with their mouths, our stacking toy offer peace of mind to parents.

Ideal for children aged 18 months to 5 years old, this kindergarten toy offers versatile, imaginative play that grows with your child's developmental stages. Whether you're looking for baby blocks or more advanced building toys for 3-5 kids, our set is the perfect playskool classroom educational gift for toddlers and preschoolers.
